column2: "Hello hello, welcome one and all! We're your top info brokers in ARKS! Patty here, of Patty and Tea!"
"Today's big scoop! An exclusive look at the newly approved class! Titled..."
"Blitz interview with \"Etoile\" advocate Lucotte! Hooray! Bam bam, woo woo!"
"You're starting off way too annoying, Patty. I'm sorry, Lucotte... Would you mind doing an interview with us?"
"Yes, it would be my pleasure. Please ask me anything."
"Let's start, then... First, tell us about yourself! What do you hold most dear?"
"Let me see... If I had to say, it would be \"trust\"."
"As a maid, it is important to be trustworthy so people can enjoy ease of mind while you perform your job."
"For example, it is easier to entrust a job to someone with a neat, cleanly appearance."
"I maintain my appearance as a maid to keep up a clean presence while inspiring confidence."
"I see, I see... Maid outfits are so cool! Don't you wanna try one on, Tea?!"
"Huh?! I think I'm... good."
"Next-o! Do you have any hobbies or special skills?"
"I enjoy cleaning, and I am skilled at preparing sweets."
"A cleaning enthusiast! You'd get along great with Tea!"
"I don't clean for fun, I do it because you're constantly making a mess. It's out of necessity."
"Ahaha, right right. Building on that, why do you like cleaning?"
"Because keeping everything in a clean and orderly state leads to great success."
"Although, I am often told my idea of success is too lofty..."
"If I am not satisfied with the result, I will return things to their messy state and start the cleaning over again!"
"Messing stuff up to clean it again... Wow! A real perpetual motion machine!"
"That's not what that means, dummy... You mentioned sweets before. What kinds do you make?"
"Various baked treats. I enjoy coming up with my own recipes and perfecting their taste and appearance."
"The wonderful smells as they're baking... The smile on everyone's faces when they open the boxes... The delicious taste when eating them."
"I hold all aspects of sweets-making dear to my heart... It is true bliss."
"Yes, I see... Your original recipes sound interesting! Tell me more!"
"Those are... a trade secret."
"Whaaat! That just makes me wanna know even more!"
"That's enough. Informants can't go around badgering people for info! Everyone has their secrets..."
"Everyone, huh... You know, that reminds me, the other day I saw Tea wearing a maid outfit..."
"Waaah! That concludes our interview with Lucotte, founder of Etoile! Now, if you'll excuse us!"
"Whaaat?! W-Wait Tea! Where are you taking me?!"
"Hehe... I hope we get the chance to speak again. Take care, you two!"
